code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useRedeemOnBoardroom=function useRedeemOnBoardroom(description){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleRedeem=useCallback(function(){var alertDesc=description||'Redeem BSHARE from Boardroom';handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.exitFromBoardroom(),alertDesc);},[bombFinance,description,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onRedeem:handleRedeem};};export default useRedeemOnBoardroom;
